summary.purpose: Table sub-components for data grid display including Filter, Search, ExportToExcel, table structure (Head, Body, Row, Cell, Summary), and cell renderers for specialized data types (timestamps, booleans, phone numbers, geographic locations, etc.).
summary.problem_solved: Provides reusable, memoized UI components that render table structure, handle filtering/searching, export functionality, and specialized cell rendering for different data types (dates, durations, phone numbers, coordinates, booleans, numbers).

external.name: react
external.why_used: Core React library for component structure and hooks.

external.name: react-dom
external.why_used: Portal API for rendering filter popup outside table container.

internal.why_used: useTableContext hook for accessing table state (filters, sort, search, data).
FilterProps, Direction types, and table configuration interfaces.
exportToExcel function for Excel file generation.
Button component for styled action buttons.

exports.name: Filter
exports.description_one_line: Column filter popup with multi-select checkboxes.

exports.name: MaxRowsLabel
exports.description_one_line: Label showing displayed vs total row count.

exports.name: DisplayAllRowsButton
exports.description_one_line: Toggle button for showing limited vs all rows.

exports.name: ExportToExcel
exports.description_one_line: Button to export table data to Excel file.

exports.name: Search
exports.description_one_line: Search input field for filtering table rows.

exports.name: TableHead
exports.description_one_line: Table header with sortable columns and filters.

exports.name: TableBody
exports.description_one_line: Table body rendering filtered and sorted rows.

exports.name: TableRow
exports.description_one_line: Single table row with cells and row selection.

exports.name: TableCell
exports.description_one_line: Individual table cell with value display.

exports.name: Summary
exports.description_one_line: Footer showing sum calculations for numeric columns.

exports.name: TimesUI
exports.description_one_line: Formatted timestamp display with customizable format.

exports.name: DurationUI
exports.description_one_line: Formatted duration display (days, hours, minutes, seconds).

exports.name: PhoneUI
exports.description_one_line: Phone number display with direction support.

exports.name: BooleanUi
exports.description_one_line: Check/X icon renderer for boolean values.

exports.name: GeoUi
exports.description_one_line: Google Maps link for geographic coordinates.

symbols.name: Filter
symbols.description_one_line: Multi-select filter popup portal rendered outside table.

details.what_it_does: Portal-based filter component that displays a popup with checkboxes for filtering a table column. Positioned to avoid clipping (192px wide, appears above/below button). Supports custom UI rendering for filter options, handles RTL/LTR layout. Shows filter icons (empty/slash) indicating active filters.
details.rendered_ui_description: Fixed-position popup with title, close/clear buttons, scrollable list of sortable filter options with checkboxes. Anchors to filter button in header with 8px gap. RTL-aware positioning (left vs right alignment).

params.name: props
params.description: Contains filterableColumn (header, dataKey, ui function) and index (column position)

returns.description: Filter button and portal popup with checkboxes

extensive_correct.title: Filter with custom UI renderer
extensive_correct.code:
<Filter filterableColumn={{
  header: 'Country',
  dataKey: 'country',
  ui: (option) => option === 'US' ? 'ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ United States' : option
}} index={0} />

symbols.name: MaxRowsLabel
symbols.description_one_line: Displays count of displayed rows vs total rows.

details.what_it_does: Renders text labels showing 'X of Y' rows: (maxRowsLabel1) {displayed count} (maxRowsLabel2) {total count}. Uses custom maxRowsContainerClassName. Memoized for performance with renderOnce optimization.

returns.description: Flex container with row count labels and numbers

symbols.name: DisplayAllRowsButton
symbols.description_one_line: Button to toggle between showing limited rows vs all rows.

details.what_it_does: Renders styled button that toggles displayAllRows state. Shows either maxRows (limited) or total filtered count. Button label is customizable (displayAllRowsButtonLabel, default 'Display:'). Styled with green background, hover effect, and custom className support.

minimal_correct.title: Standalone usage
minimal_correct.code: <DisplayAllRowsButton /> // Toggles between limited and full row display

symbols.name: ExportToExcel
symbols.description_one_line: Button to export table data to Excel file.

details.what_it_does: Renders button with Excel icon that exports rendered table data to .xlsx file. Supports adding custom properties to export, column header mapping, sum row calculations, and direction-aware cell alignment (LTR/RTL). Integrates with exportToExcel helper for file generation.

returns.description: Button element with Excel export icon

minimal_correct.title: Basic Excel export
minimal_correct.code: <ExportToExcel /> // Triggers Excel download with current table data

symbols.name: Search
symbols.description_one_line: Search input field for filtering table rows by text.

details.what_it_does: Text input with type='search' for filtering table rows. Supports custom placeholder, className, style, and autoFocus. Memoized with renderOnce optimization. Connected to table context handleSearch callback.

minimal_correct.title: Search in table toolbar
minimal_correct.code: <Search /> // Filters visible rows as user types

symbols.name: TableHead
symbols.description_one_line: Table header row with sortable columns and filter buttons.

details.what_it_does: Sticky table header with columns mapped from headers array. Supports sorting (click to sort by column, shows sort icon), filtering (displays filter button for filterable columns), RTL/LTR direction. Memoized for performance. Shows sort direction icon (up/down) when active.

returns.description: thead element with th cells for each column

minimal_correct.title: Table header with sort and filter

symbols.name: TableBody
symbols.description_one_line: Table body container rendering filtered and sorted rows.

details.what_it_does: Maps over dataToRender.renderedData array and renders TableRow component for each item. Memoized for performance. Supports custom tbody className and zebra striping through TableRow props.

symbols.name: TableRow
symbols.description_one_line: Single table row with cell rendering and row selection.

details.what_it_does: Renders tr element with TableCell components for each keysToRender. Supports zebra striping (even/odd row colors), row selection highlighting, row click handlers, custom row className/function, and row styles. Shows hover effect (gray background).

params.name: index
params.description: Row index for zebra striping and row selection

symbols.name: TableCell
symbols.description_one_line: Individual table cell with value display and tooltip.

details.what_it_does: Renders td element with cell content. Shows title tooltip for string/number/boolean values. Supports custom cell className and style. Text is truncated with ellipsis (max-width: 130px).

symbols.name: Summary
symbols.description_one_line: Footer showing sum calculations for numeric columns.

details.what_it_does: Renders summary footer with sum calculations for columns specified in sumColumns array. Each sum is calculated by reducing rendered data, formatted with getFixedNumber, and can be customized with ui function. Displays label + sum value for each summed column. Supports RTL direction.

symbols.name: TimesUI
symbols.description_one_line: Formatted timestamp display with customizable format.

details.what_it_does: Displays timestamp converted to string using timestamp_to_string helper. Supports custom format, fromFormat, timezone, and fallback defaultReturnedValue. LTR-directed text with RTL text-alignment support. Shows title tooltip with formatted time.

params.name: timestamp
params.description: Timestamp to format (Unix timestamp, Date object, or string)

params.name: fromFormat
params.description: Input format if timestamp is string

params.name: defaultReturnedValue
params.description: Fallback value if timestamp is invalid

returns.description: div element with formatted timestamp text

extensive_correct.title: With custom format and timezone
extensive_correct.code:
<TimesUI 
  timestamp="2024-02-16"
  fromFormat="YYYY-MM-DD"
  format="DD/MM/YYYY HH:mm"
  tz="America/New_York"
  direction="ltr"
/>

symbols.name: TableButton
symbols.description_one_line: Action button with predefined icons (add/edit/delete) or custom content.

details.what_it_does: Renders button with Font Awesome icons for add/edit/delete operations, or custom HTML content. Supports disabled state, click handler, title tooltip, and custom className. Uses scale animation (hover:scale-110) and fade effect for disabled state.

params.name: type
params.description: Button type determines icon or custom rendering

returns.description: Button element with icon or custom content

extensive_correct.title: Edit button with tooltip
extensive_correct.code:
<TableButton 
  type="edit" 
  onClick={handleEdit}
  title="Edit row"
  disabled={isLoading}
  className="text-yellow-500"
/>

symbols.name: DurationUI
symbols.description_one_line: Formatted duration display in d:h:m:s format.

details.what_it_does: Converts seconds to d:h:m:s format with customizable labels for each unit. Only displays non-zero units. LTR-directed with RTL alignment support. Shows full duration in title tooltip.

minimal_correct.title: Display duration
minimal_correct.code: <DurationUI duration={90061} /> // Shows: "1 d 1 h 1 m 1 s"

extensive_correct.title: Custom labels
extensive_correct.code:
<DurationUI 
  duration={3661}
  daysLabel="×™×•×"
  hoursLabel="×©×¢×”"
  direction="rtl"
/> // Shows: "1 ×©×¢×” 1 m 1 s"

symbols.name: PhoneUI
symbols.description_one_line: Phone number display with direction support.

details.what_it_does: Displays phone number as text with LTR force and optional RTL text-alignment. Shows title tooltip with phone number. Supports custom className.

symbols.name: BooleanUi
symbols.description_one_line: Check/X icon renderer for boolean true/false values.

details.what_it_does: Displays Font Awesome check icon (fa-light fa-check) for true, X icon (fa-light fa-xmark) for false. Supports customizable icons (trueUi, falseUi) and sizes (big/small). Default size is big (text-2xl).

returns.description: Icon element (i tag with Font Awesome classes or custom ReactNode)

minimal_correct.title: Display boolean
minimal_correct.code:
<BooleanUi value={true} /> // Shows green check icon
<BooleanUi value={false} /> // Shows red X icon

symbols.name: GeoUi
symbols.description_one_line: Clickable Google Maps link for geographic coordinates.

details.what_it_does: Renders clickable link to Google Maps with latitude/longitude. Supports both Geo type (lng/lat) and number properties (longitude/latitude). Customizable link UI text. Opens Google Maps in new tab.

params.name: value
params.description: Geographic coordinates with lng/lat or longitude/latitude properties

params.name: linkUi
params.description: Custom link text (default: space-separated lng lat)

returns.description: Anchor element linking to Google Maps

minimal_correct.title: Display coordinates
minimal_correct.code: <GeoUi value={{ lng: -74.006, lat: 40.7128 }} /> // New York link

extensive_correct.title: Custom link text
extensive_correct.code:
<GeoUi 
  value={{ longitude: 2.3522, latitude: 48.8566 }}
  linkUi="View on Maps ðŸ“"
/>

details.what_it_does: Displays numeric value as text with LTR force and optional RTL text-alignment. Shows title tooltip with number. Supports custom className.
